articles.title: Earth's Deepest Enigma Burns Far Beneath Your Feet - IFLScience
articles.description: Earth's inner core is like another world.
articles.content: Thousands of kilometers below your feet, there lies a red-hot ball of solid iron. Simply known as Earths inner core, the metallic heart of our planet remains relatively enigmatic despite the advances… [+3117 chars]

articles.title: Campus surveillance: students and professors decry sensors in buildings - Nature.com
articles.description: Privacy campaigners fear that the devices could be used for disciplinary purposes, and some universities have deactivated them after protests.
